alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bibb, northeastern Peach, north central Houston and northeastern Crawford Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Skipperton, or 8 miles southwest of Macon, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Centerville, Byron, Lizella, Powerville, Jack Brown Estates, Skipperton, Rutland and Middle Georgia Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
